attributes.action: Keep The Plans To Build A Childrens Hospital in Leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After plans for a new children hospital were scrapped, i thought it was time to take action!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/LeedsChildHosp/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
